description.description: A Ranged attacker with high firepower who weakens enemies from the hindmost side.

introduction.introduction: Choi Jihoon is a Sniper who enhances his allies while periodically attacking enemies at the rear line. He's also a member of the Militia that hunts down Counter criminals. A former soldier and sniper, he uses his experience to teach shooting to new Militia recruits. He's straightforward, even harsh at times, but his honest advice helps his members stay on the right track. Despite his efforts, however, the Militia now only has a few members left. In the face of the harsh reality that costs him his men every day, he struggles to maintain his sanity for the sake of the others who rely on him.

baseDescription.baseDescription: Fires a custom sniper rifle at the foremost target.
Inflicts 20% more damage on Counters. Basic attacks blind the target for 2 seconds. (Bosses excluded)
Increases Ranged DMG by 10% for all ally Rangers and Snipers while on the field.
After every 5th Basic attack, he delivers an enhanced attack to the farthest enemy within range. This enhanced attack always crits and inflicts 100% more damage on Snipers.

level5.level5: Lv. 5 Precise Shooting effect for 5 s
